features.title: Stop Getting Filtered Out Before Humans See Your Resume
features.subtitle: Match the keywords recruiters search for, not just what's in the job posting

items.title: Get Past Resume Robots
items.description: Most resumes never reach a human. We identify the exact keywords that unlock ATS filters.

items.title: See Your Score Before You Apply
items.description: Know exactly how well you match before hitting submit. No more wondering if you'll hear back.

items.title: Results in 30 Seconds
items.description: Upload your resume, paste the job description. Your match score appears in half a minute.

items.title: Templates That Get Opened
items.description: Recruiter-tested layouts that scan cleanly in every ATS. No graphics that confuse the robots.

items.title: Track Your Applications
items.description: See which jobs you've applied to and which resumes you used. Keep everything organized.

items.title: Your Data Stays Private
items.description: We encrypt everything and never train AI on your resumes. Delete your account anytime.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Resumely, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered resume optimization service.

provided.title: Information you provide to us:
items: Account information: Name, email address, and password when you create an account
Resume data: Resume files and content you upload for optimization
Job descriptions: Job description text you input for comparison
Payment information: Payment details processed securely via Stripe (we do not store credit card numbers)
Communications: Messages you send us and newsletter subscriptions

automatic.title: Information collected automatically:
items: Usage data: Pages visited, features used, time spent on our platform
Device information: Browser type, operating system, IP address
Analytics data: Collected via Google Analytics and PostHog for service improvement

useInfo.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
useInfo.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide and improve our AI resume optimization service
Generate personalized resume suggestions using AI technology
Calculate ATS compatibility scores for your resume
Send you transactional emails (account confirmations, service updates)
Send marketing communications (with your consent, opt-out available)
Analyze usage patterns to improve our product and user experience
Prevent fraud and ensure platform security
Comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms of Service

security.title: 3. Data Security
security.intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
items: Encryption in transit: All data transmitted using HTTPS/TLS encryption
Encryption at rest: Sensitive data encrypted in our database
Secure authentication: Password hashing and secure session management via Supabase Auth
Access controls: Strict role-based access to user data
Regular security audits: Ongoing monitoring and security assessments
security.outro: However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We use the following third-party services to operate Resumely:

items.name: Google Analytics
items.description: Website analytics and user behavior tracking

items.name: PostHog
items.description: Product analytics and feature usage tracking

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.body: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. If you delete your account, we will delete your personal data within 30 days, except where retention is required by law or for legitimate business purposes (e.g., fraud prevention, resolving disputes).

rights.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
items: Access: Request a copy of your personal data
Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
Deletion: Request deletion of your account and personal data
Portability: Request your data in a machine-readable format
Opt-out: Unsubscribe from marketing emails at any time
Object: Object to processing of your data for certain purposes
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to:
items: Maintain your login session
Remember your preferences
Analyze usage patterns and improve our service
Provide personalized content
cookies.outro: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our service.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.body: Our service is not intended for individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

international.title: 9. International Data Transfers
international.body: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have different data protection laws. By using our service, you consent to the transfer of your information to the United States and other countries where we operate.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of material changes by email or through a prominent notice on our website. Your continued use of our service after changes become effective constitutes acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

gdpr.title: 12. GDPR Compliance (EU Users)
gdpr.intro: If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have additional rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
items: Right to withdraw consent at any time
Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority
Right to restriction of processing
Right to object to automated decision-making
gdpr.outro: Our legal basis for processing your data includes: consent, contractual necessity, legitimate interests, and legal compliance.

ccpa.title: 13. California Privacy Rights (CCPA)
ccpa.intro: California residents have specific rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA):
items: Right to know what personal information is collected
Right to know if personal information is sold or disclosed
Right to opt-out of the sale of personal information (we do not sell your data)
Right to deletion of personal information
Right to non-discrimination for exercising CCPA rights

privacy.closingNote: This Privacy Policy is effective as of December 23, 2025. By using Resumely, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Resumely. By accessing or using our AI-powered resume optimization service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.body: By creating an account, accessing, or using Resumely ("Service", "Platform", "we", "our", or "us"), you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our Service.

service.title: 2. Service Description
service.intro: Resumely provides the following AI-powered resume optimization services:
items: Applicant Tracking System (ATS) compatibility analysis
Resume content optimization suggestions powered by artificial intelligence
Job description matching and keyword optimization
ATS scoring and compatibility metrics
Professional resume templates optimized for ATS systems
Resume export functionality (PDF format)
service.outro: Our Service uses AI technology (powered by OpenAI) to analyze your resume and provide suggestions. Results may vary, and we do not guarantee specific outcomes or job placement.

creation.title: Account Creation
creation.intro: To use certain features of our Service, you must create an account. You agree to:
items: Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration
Maintain and promptly update your account information
Maintain the security of your account password
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
Immediately notify us of any unauthorized account access
Not share your account credentials with others

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.body: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these Terms, fraudulent activity, or any other reason at our discretion. You may delete your account at any time through your account settings.

tiers.title: Pricing Tiers
tiers.intro: Resumely offers the following pricing plans:
items: Free Tier: One (1) resume optimization per user account
Premium Plan: $9/month for unlimited resume optimizations, premium templates, and priority support

payment.title: Payment Terms
items: All payments are processed securely through Stripe
Subscriptions renew automatically on a monthly basis unless cancelled
You authorize us to charge your payment method for all fees due
Prices are subject to change with 30 days notice
All fees are non-refundable except as required by law or stated in our refund policy

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.body: Premium subscriptions are eligible for a full refund within 7 days of purchase if you are not satisfied with the service. To request a refund, contact us at resumebuilderaiteam@gmail.com with your account details.

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.body: You may cancel your Premium subscription at any time through your account settings. Cancellation takes effect at the end of your current billing period. You will retain access to Premium features until the end of the paid period.

acceptableUse.title: 5. Acceptable Use Policy
acceptableUse.intro: You agree NOT to use our Service to:
items: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Upload malicious code, viruses, or harmful content
Infringe upon intellectual property rights of others
Harass, abuse, or harm other users
Attempt to reverse engineer, decompile, or extract our AI models
Use automated scripts, bots, or scraping tools without permission
Share, resell, or redistribute our Service without authorization
Create multiple accounts to circumvent free tier limitations
Upload resumes or content that you do not have rights to
Use our Service to create false, misleading, or fraudulent resumes

yourContent.title: Your Content
yourContent.body: You retain all ownership rights to your resume content, job descriptions, and other materials you upload to our Service. By uploading content, you grant us a limited license to use, process, and analyze your content solely for the purpose of providing our Service and improving our AI models.

ourProperty.title: Our Property
ourProperty.body: Resumely, our logo, AI models, algorithms, software, templates, and all related intellectual property are owned by us or our licensors. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written permission.

aiContent.title: 7. AI-Generated Content and Suggestions
aiContent.intro: Important disclaimers about our AI-powered service:
items: AI-generated suggestions are automated and may contain errors or inaccuracies
You are responsible for reviewing and verifying all suggestions before use
AI suggestions should be used as guidance, not absolute rules
We do not guarantee that AI suggestions will improve your job search outcomes
You should customize and personalize AI suggestions to match your experience
Never include false or misleading information in your resume, even if suggested by AI

asIs.title: Service Provided "As Is"
asIs.body: Our Service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

employment.title: No Employment Guarantee
employment.body: Important: Resumely provides resume optimization tools and suggestions but does NOT guarantee job interviews, job offers, or employment outcomes. Your success in job searching depends on many factors beyond our Service.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.intro: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Resumely and its affiliates shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from:
items: Your use or inability to use the Service
Any unauthorized access to or use of our servers and/or personal information
Any errors, mistakes, or inaccuracies in AI-generated content
Any job search outcomes or lack thereof
liability.outro: Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.

indemnification.title: 9. Indemnification
indemnification.body: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Resumely and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including legal fees) arising from your use of the Service, violation of these Terms, or infringement of any third-party rights.

privacy.title: 10. Data Privacy and Security
privacy.body: Your use of our Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. We implement industry-standard security measures, but cannot guarantee absolute security. Please refer to our

thirdParty.title: 11. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.body: Our Service integrates with third-party services including OpenAI (AI processing), Stripe (payments), and others. Your use of these services may be subject to their respective terms and conditions. We are not responsible for the practices of third-party services.

changes.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.body: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Material changes will be notified via email or through a prominent notice on our website at least 30 days before taking effect. Your continued use of the Service after changes become effective constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

governing.title: 13. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
governing.body: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, without regard to conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of the Service shall be resolved through binding arbitration, except where prohibited by law.

severability.title: 14. Severability
severability.body: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision shall be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary, and the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.

entire.title: 15. Entire Agreement
entire.body: These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and Resumely regarding the use of our Service and supersede all prior agreements and understandings.

contact.title: 16. Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

acknowledgment.title: Acknowledgment
acknowledgment.body: BY USING RESUMELY, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ, UNDERSTOOD, AND AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS OF SERVICE. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THESE TERMS, YOU MAY NOT USE OUR SERVICE.
